meanings.definition: To bring shame or dishonor upon
meanings.sent1: His reckless behavior could disgrace the entire team.
meanings.sent2: She did not want to disgrace her family by failing the exam.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter managed to disgrace himself by spilling drinks on the guests.
